name: The Land
overview: Player S: Yes. Yes, this is a fertile land, and we will thrive. We will rule over all the land, and we will call it... "The Land." Player A: I think we should call it "your grave!" Player S: Ah, curse your sudden but inevitable betrayal! Player A: Har har har! Mine is an evil laugh! Now die! Player S: Oh, no! Oh, dear God in heaven, help!
